text: The men's 5000 metres event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 17 and 19 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Haile Gebrselassie ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Ismael Kirui ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Hicham El-Guerrouj ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 19 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 5000 metres
